content: {"name": "Hetrick- Martin Institute", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Focuses on the LGBTQ community who are between 15 -24\n- ", "email": "", "url": "https://hmi.org/get-involved/support-our-pantry/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "740 Broadway", "address_2": null, "city": "Broadway Triangle", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11206", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7007902, "longitude": -73.9423821}, "phones": [{"number": "(212) 674-2400", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "22:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Members Only"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Focuses on LGBTQ community"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Provides a snack or supper, upon request"}]}
